title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, published on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, available on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (Docker-ready) with chat, model management, RAG and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: A Rust-based TUI client for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama installations with GPU drivers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within notes.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI wrapper that exposes extra endpoints (batch, async queues) on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server that exposes Ollama as a context-aware tool for Claude & others.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Self-hosted Telegram bot that chats via Ollama with per-user model selection.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.js bot bringing Ollama LLMs into Discord servers with slash commands and threads.
